name: Cakalang Fufu
desc: Traditional smoked skipjack tuna, hand-shredded and stir-fried with hot chilies.

name: Ayam Woku
desc: Aromatic chicken pieces simmered in turmeric, ginger, and fresh basil leaves.

name: Ikan Tude Bakar
desc: Grilled mackerel (Tude) served with a side of dabu-dabu, a fresh salsa made of raw chopped chilies, shallots, green tomatoes, and lime juice.

name: Tinutuan
desc: A savory, nutritious vegetable porridge made from rice, pumpkin, sweet potato, and corn, served with salted fish and spicy sambal roa.
